description:
Wallace Island is a BC Provincial Marine Park easily accessible from Hudson Point on Saltspring 
Island. The park offers two kayak camp sites, hiking trails and excellent wildlife viewing opportunities.
Wallace Island makes an excellent winter day paddle. The area is the winter home of a wide variety 
of migratory sea birds, and the boat traffic drops to nothing.
Pros:
* Easily accessible - 1.6 km crossing from Saltspring Island
* Good camping
* Excellent wildlife viewing
Cons:
* High boat traffic, especially in summer
directions:
The launch point is the Hudson Point boat launch, located 0.8 km WNW of the Fernwood dock at the 
intersection of North Beach Road, Walker's Hook Road and North End Road.
title: Wallace Island Provincial Marine Park
